name: Interactive heart - Figma Challenge - 15 tips in 15 days (Day 1)
description:
This Interactive Heart was made for Figma Prototype Challenge in 15 days. The purpose is to promote and teach you how to use Smart Animate in a more interesting way.

The file depict an animated heart in the middle of the screen. Hover and tap on the heart to see how it react.


Move to Prototype page inside the file and click play to see the whole action.


If you found this helpful or interesting, please like and share. Thank you for your time!
